entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:36 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
